long_description: When the temperature drops, your activity level doesn't have to. Tackle your cool-weather fitness goals in the stretchy, warm and moisture-wicking REI Airflyte Running pants. Quick-drying fabric offers lightweight warmth, and 4-way stretch lets you move freely. Mesh insets along legs and behind knees vent heat. Side ankle zippers make it easy to put on pants over footwear. Zippered lumbar pocket secures and centers workout extras on your back. Reflective details increase visibility in dim light. The REI Airflyte Running pants have a slim, performance fit.
short_description: When the temperature drops, your activity level doesn't have to. Tackle your cool-weather fitness goals in the stretchy, warm and moisture-wicking REI Airflyte Running pants.
